Title Variants: Marei Panim
Author: Rabbi Moses Margolies
One line bio: Rabbi Moses Margolies (d. 1780) was a Lithuanian rabbi who wrote an important commentary to help others study the Jerusalem Talmud.

Title Variants: Pnei Moshe
Author: Rabbi Moses Margolies
One line bio: Rabbi Moses Margolies (d. 1780) was a Lithuanian rabbi who wrote an important commentary to help others study the Jerusalem Talmud.
Brief description: Penei Moshe is a commentary on the Jerusalem Talmud which allows readers to better understand the often difficult text.

Title Variants: Korban HaEidah, Korban HaEydah
Author: Rabbi David Frankel
One line bio: Rabbi David Frankel (d. 1762) was a German rabbi who placed great emphasis on the study of the Jerusalem Talmud.
Brief description: Korban HaEdah is a commentary on section of the Jerusalem Talmud, designed to help readers understand the often difficult language of the text.

Title Variants: Chiddushei Ridbaz, Ridba"z
Author: Rabbi Jacob David Wilovsky
One line bio: Rabbi Jacob David Wilovsky (d.1913) was a Russian teacher, scholar, and Talmudist who devoted extensive study to the Jerusalem Talmud.
